g:HTMLPanel.p: Cerberus is provided as-is to demonstrate how a cross platform application might function to help end-users maintain secure passwords while having the freedom to access them on the go. No representation are made that this software is secure or suitable for any purpose other than demonstration.
This software reuses code from several libraries shared under the Apache 2.0 licence. The specific modules are appropriately identified in the source code provided below.
